title: U guys nerfed ekko too hard...
body: Pls Rito.. u guys nerfed Ekko too hard he wasnt OP people just dont know how to counter him.. is this what u guys do? make a op champ so ppl will spend rp on them to buy them and they after a few weeks nerf..??? wth pls u guys nerfed him too hard... why did u nerf like almost everything on him.... the Ult isnt that strong ppl are just dumb cause why would they follow a ekko with a ult? its their fault dying and the heal isnt too hard.. other champs can heal more than him like Nidalee,Kayle etc. Cause this is stupid i spent money to buy his skin then u guys nerfed him too hard...

replies.body: He needed a mana cost with the ult because when a champ is OOM he should be punishable. No exceptions.
I don't agree with her ult being free either but that's a different matter.

two reasons he was slightly op
1.) His ultimate was a no cost SUPER high reward and was like giving away free candy.
2.) Some of his scalings were a bit too high. His kit is pretty balanced just the numbers needed work.
Also they nerfed his base attack speed. I

His w is inconsistent player reliant people can see it they aren't blind anymore ( they know his potential). He is drastically item reliant.  When he misses his q he misses out on so much damage.  His e  gap closer puts him in as much danger as a sitting duck don't lie and tell me his ult was to high reward.  I could only fight people who are melee most of the time. When people see me w They run like a F1 car vroom vroom. People only complain because they feed Ekko that's every character in existence as well. Example my team feed blitz kaboom no one could 1 v1 him ... he was fing support for crying out loud Riot please you Nerf him so hard.  Every person who has played Ekko has given up on his difficulty he seems like he was intended to be a support like Bard.
Ekko sucks everywhere but JG now. Maybe they just wanted him to only be viable JG.

While I think he is trolling, I do agree with the sentiment.
People piss,moan, whine and complain about his damage when they don't realize how much counter play is in his kit.  

Feed an ekko and, unless you walk stupidly into his ult, it is going to take him 2 Q's his E and at least a passive proc to kill you over the course of 5 seconds or so.  During that 5 seconds you can dodge Q's, call for back up, FIGHT BACK etc

Feed Talon, and unless you stay FAR the fuck away from him, he can kill you with E+Auto+QWR in 1 second 100-0 and the only thing you couldve done was stay out of range.  Hell if he is full build he will kill you even fast, my last talon game I hit 6 items and jumped on a 4-5 item Azir.  I killed him with E Auto Q instantly, before he could hourglass.  He died that fast.

Every other assassin will basically fucking delete you with little chance of response, but ekko who takes multiple rotations of his spells to do so over a decent chunk of time still does too much damage.

>u guys nerfed Ekko too hard he wasn't OP

.

>is thas what you guys do? make a op champ so ppl will spend rp on them


Do you even know what you want to say?

I completely agree!!! i have been an ekko main since he came out and i just for mastery rank 7 on him.... then i read this nerf they put on him thinking "ahhh it cant be that bad right?" but no! i have gone on a massive loosing streak and it just feels so uncomfortable playing him now... the satisfaction of ekko has gone for me... to the point that i might just drop him as a main and  hope that oneday he is brought back to normal...and like Xanderzs said "People just dont know how to counter him" this is so true! i have seen so many people that have just walked straight into my ult and then cried that they could do nothing to avoid it... i mean all you need to do is keep an eye on it and.....well......walk the other way??? its just so easy to avoid people just need to use their brain.... PLUS his passive...so many people that have the two procs just walk straight back into my thinking i will just do a normal auto attack then call him broken when they die to the passive damage....THESE THINGS ARE SO EASILY AVOIDED!!! Three things to keep in mind when facing an ekko....1.Watch his ult 2.try to keep your distance when you have his passive stacked on you 3. just be ready to dodge the W.... I mean its so easy to predict when its gonna go off and you get plenty of time to react and move out....sooo in a nutshell im just saying. ekko did not need a nerf at all!!! people just needed to wise up and learn how he works and how to counter. Amen
